meta.ogDescription: Experience the pinnacle of private nursing with Legacy Concierge. Our elite, compassionate nurses provide bespoke in-home care, from post-surgical recovery to chronic condition management.

steps.text: We begin with a thorough assessment led by a registered nurse, evaluating your medical needs, personal preferences, and opportunities for enhanced care. This ensures a plan aligned with your goals, values, and lifestyle.
steps.title: Detailed Care Assessment

steps.text: In an open, receptive setting, we meet with you and your family to discuss our recommendations, gather feedback, and refine a personalized care plan.
steps.title: Review Care Proposal

steps.text: You're matched with a dedicated care team, meticulously selected to meet your medical and personal needs with expertise and compassion.
steps.title: Build Personalized Care Team

steps.text: Through regular check-ins, physician coordination, and expert monitoring, we ensure your care evolves with your goals, delivering trust and dignity.
steps.title: Begin Clinical Oversight

contact.subtitle: We are here to answer any questions you may have. Reach out to us and we'll respond as soon as we can.
contact.title: Connect With Us

columns.text: The name Legacy Concierge carries a promise—to cherish your family's story as fiercely as we do our own. Founded in 2022, our mission sprang from a truth we know too well: too many families watch their loved ones suffer without the care they deserve. We've walked that path, felt that ache, and vowed to change it. Legacy Concierge delivers elite, compassionate care, woven with dignity and trust, to ensure your family's journey is met with the reverence it demands—because your legacy matters.
columns.title: Mission Rooted in Family

columns.text: Jason Kidushim, our CEO, founded Legacy Concierge driven by a profound mission, inspired by his grandfather-a war hero whose dignity was undermined by a flawed system during his battle with Alzheimer's. This injustice fueled Jason's commitment to revolutionize home healthcare. Returning to California, he leveraged decades of expertise to create a service where every client is treated like family. With unwavering dedication, Legacy Concierge delivers personalized, compassionate care with exceptional precision, ensuring your loved ones' dignity and legacy are preserved with timeless honor.
columns.title: Trust Through Origin

ourStory.title: We Honor Your Legacy as Our Own

pinnacle.text: We select only the top 3% of nursing candidates—exquisitely trained professionals whose expertise and empathy redefine care. With a 98% retention rate, our nurses embody enduring excellence, delivering bespoke health solutions with unparalleled grace and precision.
pinnacle.title: Private Nursing

subtitle: Our concierge nurses provide comprehensive, bespoke care, from post-surgical recovery and chronic condition management to wellness optimization and palliative support. With 24/7 coordination and clinical oversight, we ensure your health is managed with precision and compassion, wherever you are.

cards.author: - Michelle M.
cards.quote: "Jeanelle's exceptional care was a privilege. Her impeccable skills and proactive approach caught critical medical details doctors missed. Prompt, compassionate, and highly intelligent, she eased our burden significantly."
cards.title: Legacy Client

cards.author: - Nadine Roisman
cards.quote: "I have worked with many homecare agencies, but have yet to see an entire team work with such care and compassion as this one. Their focus is on quality care, and it is evident by their culture of their organization..."
cards.title: Owner, Olive Tree Senior Advisors

cards.author: - Sandy S.
cards.quote: "Time is the most precious thing any of us have in life. I used to wish people health and happiness, but, now I just wish people time. Legacy has changed my life. They have given my family so much more quality time with my mother."
cards.title: Legacy Client
